      Fields in view.move declared as IPanel 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected IPanel Move.panel 
      Methods in view.move with parameters of type IPanel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ISprite[][] GoToDown.goDown(int colonne, int ligne, ISprite sprite, ISprite[][] sprites, IPanel panel, IAudio audio)
      Tries to move the character down, if he cross a diamond he will collect it, if it's an opened exit he will win, if it's a monster he will die, if it's a BLOCKING sprite he wouldn't move, otherwise he will go down
      ISprite[][] GoToLeft.goLeft(int colonne, int ligne, ISprite sprite, ISprite[][] sprites, IPanel panel, IAudio audio)
      Tries to move the character left, if he cross a diamond he will collect it, if it's an opened exit he will win, if it's a monster he will die, if it's a BLOCKING sprite he wouldn't move, otherwise he will go left
      ISprite[][] GoToRight.goRight(int colonne, int ligne, ISprite sprite, ISprite[][] sprites, IPanel panel, IAudio audio)
      Tries to move the character right, if he cross a diamond he will collect it, if it's an opened exit he will win, if it's a monster he will die, if it's a BLOCKING sprite he wouldn't move, otherwise he will go right
      ISprite[][] GoToUp.goUp(int colonne, int ligne, ISprite sprite, ISprite[][] sprites, IPanel panel, IAudio audio)
      Tries to move the character up, if he cross a diamond he will collect it, if it's an opened exit he will win, if it's a monster he will die, if it's a BLOCKING sprite he wouldn't move, otherwise he will go up
